detailed-targeting-info.DESCRIBE_INTERESTS: People who have expressed an interest in or like pages related to
detailed-targeting-info.DESCRIBE_DEFAULT: People who listed their {{type}} as {{name}} in their Facebook profile.

geo-targeting-input.INVALID_LOCATION: This location is not available for targeting.

geo-targeting-info.MESSAGE: Your audience location has been changed from {{ fromNames }} to {{ toName }}.
geo-targeting-info.MESSAGE_MISSING_BROADER: You have to include at least one broader location before you can exclude this location.
geo-targeting-info.MESSAGE_NARROW: Your audience location is set to {{ narrowerLocationNames }}, so everything outside of this location is automatically excluded.

geo-targeting-radius.USE_RADIUS_INFO: Surrounding cities are included if the center of the city falls within the radius.

geo-targeting-type.ALL_INFO: People whose home or most recent location is within the selected area.
geo-targeting-type.HOME: People who live in this location
geo-targeting-type.HOME_INFO: People whose home is within the selected area.
geo-targeting-type.RECENT_INFO: People whose most recent location is within the selected area.
geo-targeting-type.TRAVEL_IN_INFO: People whose most recent location is within the selected area but whose home is more than 125 mi/200 km away.
